Dec 16th & 17th, 2016

AU Convocation Hall
Get ready to step into the world of IT!!
Are you ready for life after college? Do you want to make a difference in your career? Then, here is an inspiring turn. Miracle's Digital Summit brings you a great opportunity to step into the giant companies where you can improve quality of your life. In this digital economy, it is important for students to gain digital skills, and that is what Miracle and AP Cloud plan to do. Join us at Digital Summit 2016 for a job fair with over 40 companies which will give you the chance to do what you love right here in Vizag.
Interview Date : December 16th & 17th, 2016
Interview Timing : Walk-in from 9:30 AM
Interview Venue : AU Convocation Hall, Andhra University, Visakhapatnam
Please carry the below mentioned documents :
  • Hard copy of your latest resume
  • 2 passport sized photos
  • Photocopies of all your certificates
    •
     
    AP Digital Summit
    Digital Summit '16 is a week long extravaganza of technology, fun and opportunities all wrapped together at Visakhapatnam - The Digital Valley! The summit will bring together students, academicians, technologists, executives and NRIs with technical talks by Microsoft, IBM and Oracle, a 24-hour code-a-thon, a 2-day job fair and loads of fun and activities all focussed on Digital Transformation technologies.
    We, Miracle a Diamond Sponsor for the event heartily invite you to experience the enlightenment of the magnificent forum, Digital Summit which is to be held from December 12th, 2016 to December 17th, 2016 at Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India. It is wholly dedicated to Digital Transformation Technologies such as CAMSS, an acronym for Cloud, Application, Mobile, Social, and Security. Also, it offers you an opportunity to meet up with Government Officials and also other US Government Dignitaries.

    Freshers Positions
    Software Trainee
    B. Tech (CSE/IT/ECE)/MCA - 2015/16/17 passouts with 65% are eligible, good knowledge in Core Java, and excellent communication skills are a must, and Java certification is an added advantage.
    Business Development Executive
    Any Degree/MBA - 2014/15/16 passouts possessing flexibility with US shifts, good comm. Skills, IT and business knowledge, and ability to drive business meets through phone/email are eligible.
    US-IT Recruiter
    Any Degree/MBA - 2014/15/16 passouts are eligible, excellent comm. skills, flexible with US shifts, ability to search profiles on job portals, and run end to end recruitment process are a must.
    PMO Executive
    Any Degree/MBA - 2014/15/16 passouts are eligible, excellent communication skills, soft skills, flexibility with US shifts are a must. And, knowledge of MS Office Tools is an added advantage.
    Shortly About Us!!
    Miracle Software Systems, Inc., is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, Michigan with Global Delivery Centers in US, Canada and India. With over 20 years of industry experience, Miracle and its team of 2000 employees has been helping numerous Fortune 1000 customers globally to achieve their business goals through technology.
    Miracle's presence spans across 5 continents and expertise spans over Application Development and Management, Cloud Infrastructure and Applications, Hybrid Integration, ERP Development and Support, and Information Management. Our teams are dedicated to help you achieve goals and reduce costs through the use of technology.
    Experienced Positions
    Sr.Java Developer
    1-3 years of proven working experience in Java development. B.Tech/Masters degree in Computer Science. Knowledge on Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies (JPA2, Hibernate).
    Soft Skills Trainer
    Any Degree/PG with 0-2 years of experience in teaching/training communicative english, excellent comm. skills, and ability to carry out soft skills training for new hires are a must.
    Sr. Business Development Executive
    1-3 years of experience in the same field are eligible, should have good communication skills, ability to schedule F2F meetings with customers, find service opportunities, and software sales.
    Sr. US-IT Recruiter
    2-5 years of experience in US IT Staffing is must, should have excellent comm. skills, technical screening skills, and thorough understanding of IT terminologies and technologies.
